canonical.name: Tch'ien
canonical.title: 1. Tch'ien / The Creative
canonical.judgment: Tch'ien represents what is great and originating, penetrating, advantageous, correct and firm.
canonical.image: Heaven, in its motion, gives the idea of strength. The superior person, in accordance with this, will nerve their being to ceaseless activity.

1.text: we see the dragon lying hidden in the deep. It is not the time for active doing.

2.text: we see the dragon appearing in the field. It will be advantageous to meet with the great person.

3.text: we see the superior person active and vigilant all the day, and in the evening still careful and apprehensive. The position is dangerous, but there will be no mistake.

4.text: we see the dragon looking as if they were leaping up, but still in the deep. There will be no mistake.

5.text: we see the dragon on the wing in the sky. It will be advantageous to meet with the great person.

6.text: we see the dragon exceeding the proper limits. There will be occasion for repentance.

metadata.notes: Original translation preserved from pyChing v1.2.2
